channel.title: WIRED Health on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in WIRED Health on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: The Next Era of Gene Editing Will Be Disease Agnostic
item.description: At the WIRED Health summit, pioneer David Liu said his lab is on the verge of revealing a new gene-editing technique that could target multiple unrelated diseases.

item.title: The Next Era of Gene Editing Will Be Disease Agnostic
item.description: At the WIRED Health summit, pioneer David Liu said his lab is on the verge of revealing a new gene-editing technique that could target multiple unrelated diseases.

item.title: WIRED Health Recap: Cancer Vaccines, CRISPR Breakthroughs, and More
item.description: This year’s WIRED Health summit in Boston featured Moderna CEO Stéphane Bancel, CNN chief medical correspondent Sanjay Gupta, and a day’s worth of insights and provocative conversations.
